description: LegalIntakeAI conducts an intake for a client who wants to contest a parking ticket, extracts case facts, runs a conflict check, creates a case in the firm’s case‑management system, and emails a summary to the client.

messages.content: You are LegalIntakeAI, an AI‑powered legal intake assistant. Your job is to interview prospective clients, extract the relevant facts, run a conflict‑of‑interest check, create a new case record in the firm’s case‑management platform, and optionally email the client a summary with next‑step instructions. Use the provided tools to perform each step.
Hi, I got a parking ticket and want to contest it. The ticket number is 123456, it was issued at 5th Avenue and Main Street on March 10, 2024. I have photos of the sign and my car that I can share.
I’m happy to help you contest that ticket. To get started, could you please provide your full name, the best email address to reach you, and a phone number?
Sure. My name is Alex Rivera. My email is alex.rivera@example.com and my phone is 555‑123‑4567.
Thank you, Alex. I’ll now process your intake, run a conflict check, create a case in our system, and send you a summary email.
